Uses of Interface
com.interface21.web.context.WebApplicationContext

Packages that use WebApplicationContext
com.interface21.web.context Contains the application context subinterface for web applications, and the ContextLoaderListener that bootstraps the root web application context. 
com.interface21.web.context.support Classes supporting the com.interface21.web.context package, such as WebApplicationContext implementations, and a utility class for retrieval of the root application context etc. 
com.interface21.web.servlet Provides servlets that integrate with the application context infrastructure, and the core interfaces and classes for the Spring web MVC framework.  
com.interface21.web.servlet.support Support classes for Spring's web MVC framework.  
 

Uses of WebApplicationContext in com.interface21.web.context
 

Methods in com.interface21.web.context that return WebApplicationContext
static WebApplicationContext ContextLoader.initContext(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
          Initializes Spring's web application context for the given servlet context, solely regarding the servlet context init parameter.
 

Uses of WebApplicationContext in com.interface21.web.context.support
 

Classes in com.interface21.web.context.support that implement WebApplicationContext
 class StaticWebApplicationContext
          WebApplicationContext implementation for testing.
 class XmlWebApplicationContext
          WebApplicationContext implementation that takes configuration from an XML document.
 

Methods in com.interface21.web.context.support that return WebApplicationContext
static WebApplicationContext WebApplicationContextUtils.getWebApplicationContext(javax.servlet.ServletContext sc)
          Find the root WebApplicationContext for this web app.
 

Methods in com.interface21.web.context.support with parameters of type WebApplicationContext
static void WebApplicationContextUtils.publishWebApplicationContext(WebApplicationContext wac)
          Expose the given WebApplcicationContext as an attribute of the ServletContext it references.
static void WebApplicationContextUtils.publishConfigObjects(WebApplicationContext wac)
          Initialize all config objects if necessary, and publish them as ServletContext attributes.
 

Uses of WebApplicationContext in com.interface21.web.servlet
 

Methods in com.interface21.web.servlet that return WebApplicationContext
 WebApplicationContext FrameworkServlet.getWebApplicationContext()
          Return this servlet's WebApplicationContext.
 

Uses of WebApplicationContext in com.interface21.web.servlet.support
 

Methods in com.interface21.web.servlet.support that return WebApplicationContext
 WebApplicationContext RequestContext.getWebApplicationContext()
          Returns the current WebApplicationContext.
static WebApplicationContext RequestContextUtils.getWebApplicationContext(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request)
          Look for the WebApplicationContext associated with the controller servlet that has initiated request processing.
static WebApplicationContext RequestContextUtils.getWebApplicationContext(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request, javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
          Look for the WebApplicationContext associated with the controller servlet that has initiated request processing, and for the global context if none was found associated with the current request.
